articles.title: England football shirts 'should connect people' - BBC.com
articles.description: Nike's England kit reignites rows over national identity familiar to designers of previous shirts.

articles.title: Three clubs considering hiring Erik ten Hag as manager if he's sacked by Man Utd including 'dream' role - SPORTbible
articles.description: Three clubs are keen on appointing the Manchester United manager.
articles.content:
Three clubs are reportedly considering the appointment of Erik ten Hag as manager if he is sacked by Manchester United, according to reports.
Ten Hag is nearing the end of his second season in charg… [+2446 chars]
